title: Entry doesn't belong in directory.. errors when using rclone sync with s3
body:
Hi,

I installed rclone on my Ubuntu 16.04 LTS server and I want to sync a remote s3 bucket to a local directory. When using rclone sync I got a couple of directory related errors.

This is my config file:

```
[test-s3]
type = s3
env_auth = false
access_key_id = <id>
secret_access_key = <key>
region = eu-west-1
endpoint =
location_constraint = eu-west-1
acl = authenticated-read
server_side_encryption =
storage_class =
```

This is the output of rclone:

```
root@light:~/scripts/local# rclone sync -vv --ignore-existing test-s3:deeldrie --delete-after /home/data/storage/backup/test/
2017/08/24 09:43:16 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.37-101-g0158ab69β" starting with parameters ["rclone" "sync" "-vv" "--ignore-existing" "test-s3:deeldrie" "--delete-after" "/home/data/storage/backup/test/"]
2017/08/24 09:43:16 INFO  : Local file system at /home/data/storage/backup/test: Modify window is 1ns
2017/08/24 09:43:16 DEBUG : some-video.mov: Destination exists, skipping
2017/08/24 09:43:17 ERROR : folder 1/: Entry doesn't belong in directory "folder 1" (same as directory) - ignoring
2017/08/24 09:43:17 ERROR : folder 2/: Entry doesn't belong in directory "folder 2" (same as directory) - ignoring
2017/08/24 09:43:17 DEBUG : folder 2/Screen Shot 2017-08-24 at 08.10.01.png: Destination exists, skipping
2017/08/24 09:43:17 INFO  : Local file system at /home/data/storage/backup/test: Waiting for checks to finish
2017/08/24 09:43:17 INFO  : Local file system at /home/data/storage/backup/test: Waiting for transfers to finish
2017/08/24 09:43:17 INFO  : Waiting for deletions to finish
2017/08/24 09:43:17 INFO  :
Transferred:      0 Bytes (0 Bytes/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 2
Transferred:            0
Elapsed time:       200ms

2017/08/24 09:43:17 DEBUG : Go routines at exit 8
2017/08/24 09:43:17 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.37-101-g0158ab69β" finishing with parameters ["rclone" "sync" "-vv" "--ignore-existing" "test-s3:deeldrie" "--delete-after" "/home/data/storage/backup/test/"]

```


This are the contents at the remote source:

```
├── folder 1
├── folder 2
│   └── Screen Shot 2017-08-24 at 08.10.01.png
└── some-video.mov
```


This are the contents at the local target (after the rclone sync) :

```
├── folder 2
│   └── Screen Shot 2017-08-24 at 08.10.01.png
└── some-video.mov
```


Do I miss something? Or do we have a bug here?
